title: Lunch Clerk
status: Part Time, 27.5 hours per weekMinimum Requirements:This position may includeFood Service Worker essential duties when additional support is needed.  A valid Food Handler’s Permit/License and a valid Utah Driver's License is required for the Food Service Worker essential duties.The salary for this position is assigned to Level 1 of the FD Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkFD Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Lunch Clerk.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
